Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • resources.GameObject

  • public class Button
extends GameObject

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Executes upon the button being pressed.

      Executes upon the button being released.
      static void clear()
      Destroys all buttons.
      void destroy()
      Removes the button.
      void resetButtonState()
      Resets the button to it's unpressed state without invoking the method passed into the constructor.

              int y,
              java.lang.reflect.Method method,
              BufferedDevice device)
        Creates a new Button.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the button.
        y - The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the button.
        method - The method to run when the button is pressed.
        device - The BufferedDevice that contains the button.
